# SCNParticleSystem.ParticleProperty

**Structure**

Keys identifying properties of individual particles, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/propertyControllers] dictionary and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/handle(_:forProperties:handler:)] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] methods.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ParticleProperty
```

## Type Properties

- **angle**: The rotation angle, in radians, of the particle about its axis.
- **angularVelocity**: The particle’s angular velocity (or rate of spin), in radians per second.
- **bounce**: The particle’s restitution coefficient.
- **charge**: The particle’s electric charge, in coulombs.
- **color**: The particle’s tint color, as a vector of red, green, blue, and alpha component values.
- **contactNormal**: The normal vector, in scene coordinate space, of a collision between a particle and a geometry in the scene.
- **contactPoint**: The location, in scene coordinate space, of a collision between a particle and a geometry in the scene.
- **frame**: The current frame index of the particle’s image animation.
- **frameRate**: The rate, in frames per second, of the particle’s image animation.
- **friction**: The particle’s friction coefficient.
- **life**: The remaining time in the particle’s life span, in seconds.
- **opacity**: The particle’s opacity (or alpha value).
- **position**: The particle’s position vector in scene coordinate space.
- **rotationAxis**: The particle’s axis of rotation, expressed as a vector in the particle’s local coordinate space.
- **size**: The width and height of the rendered particle image, in units of scene coordinate space.
- **velocity**: The particle’s velocity vector in units (of scene coordinate space) per second.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Modifying Particles Over Time

- **propertyControllers**: A dictionary that optionally associates particle properties with objects that animate a property’s value for each particle.
- **addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)**: Adds a block that modifies particle properties, to be executed each time SceneKit renders a frame.
- **removeModifiers(at:)**: Removes particle modifier blocks for the specified stage of the particle simulation.
- **removeAllModifiers()**: Removes all particle modifier blocks associated with the particle system.
- **SCNParticleModifierStage**: Stages of SceneKit’s particle simulation process into which you can insert modifier blocks, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] method.
- **SCNParticleModifierBlock**: The signature for blocks called by SceneKit to modify particle properties on each frame of simulation, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/addModifier(forProperties:at:modifier:)] method.
